attributes.action: Compensate all people whose bank details were compromised by HMRC's disk loss
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Millions of people are having to change their bank details to avoid possible fraud as a result of HMRC illegally posting their bank account data to NAO without their consent (and outside NAO's remit). This data was lost. The Data Protection Act allows for compensation for people harmed by breaches of the Act. I call on the government to compensate all concerned, apologise and promise not to repeat the actions which led to this breach.
